fields.summary: Running multiple 2NNs can result in corrupt file system

fields.description:

comments.body: Do the versions of your 2NN and NN match?
This sounds like it's related to the changes introduced in HDFS-2305.
Thank you for pointing this. There was 2NN running and it was 0.20.205.0 . After removing it from configuration i forget to kill it manualy
